mapper.select: select * from review order by rv_no desc

choose.when: select * from review where rv_u_id like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by rv_no desc
select * from review where rv_rest_name like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by rv_no desc
choose.otherwise: select * from review where rv_title like '%'||#{search}||'%' order by rv_no desc

mapper.update: update review set rv_title=#{rv_title}, rv_rest_name=#{rv_rest_name}, rv_rest_addr=#{rv_rest_addr}, rv_content=#{rv_content} where rv_no=#{rv_no}
